summary: Calculator app with UI fixes — removing extra equals buttons, keeping only one = button at the bottom of the right column.
architectural_notes: = button should appear only once, at the bottom of the right column

existing_features.title: In CalculatorKeypad, remove all extra '=' buttons from the keypad layout so that exactly one '=' button exists, positioned at the bottom of the right column.

projectName: Remove duplicate equals buttons — keep only one = at right column bottom
